name: Mix It Up - ShaneBrimson
description:
the win condition is not a bug, it is working as intended :)

this is my gameplusjam 2022 entry.

i hope you enjoy it.

this is the first game i have ever made in 48hours. 

i struggled as i lost half my work due to a pc crash but i am happy with what i have made. 

enjoy.

please let me know your thoughts :)

ive put this as £0 or donation.

i am struggling with money right now so any donations would be brilliant as i am currently unable to buy food for myself or my cat but i dont expect anything from this,
